DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to examine the effect of UV-irradiation on human cutaneous cicatrices by clinical examinations and histological, immunohistochemical and biochemical analyses.
DOC.brief_title: The Effect of UV-Irradiation on Cutaneous Cicatrices
DOC.criteria: Nonsmoking volunteers, Skintypes II or III Atopic dermatitis, Tendency to produce keloids or hypertrophic scars, Exposure of UV light during the last 3 months, Medical treatment
